Casino at Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya

Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya is located in the heart of Tokyo's scenic Shibuya area.

About Us

Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya is one of the most impressive hotels in Tokyo, highly rated and offering first-class services. Situated in the scenic Shibuya area, the hotel offers luxurious rooms with modern design.

The hotel's features include a luxurious spa, fine dining, extensive meeting facilities and responsive staff. In addition, the hotel's convenient location allows guests to easily reach the city's main attractions. Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya is deservedly highly rated for its luxurious style, impeccable service and prime location.

Attractions

Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya offers guests access to many of Tokyo's top attractions, some of which are some of the best in the city. In close proximity to the hotel is the famous Meji-jingu Temple, which attracts tourists with its beauty and historical significance. The hotel is also located close to Shibuya Crossing, the world's busiest pedestrian crossing, allowing guests to enjoy the vibrant bustle and atmosphere of the area. From the hotel's rooftop, guests can enjoy breathtaking views of the city, including the iconic Tokyo Tower.

Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya offers highly rated fine dining restaurants that deserve to be considered the best in the city. One such restaurant is a fine dining establishment featuring Japanese cuisine, where chefs create dishes using the freshest ingredients, incorporating traditional recipes with a modern twist.

Slot room

The Slot Room at Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya in Tokyo is a unique experience that deserves the highest reviews and is considered one of the best in the city. This cozy and stylish gaming room offers guests a wide selection of games, allowing everyone to enjoy the excitement and entertainment in an elegant setting.

The Slot Room at Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya attracts attention with its high level of service and amazing atmosphere that perfectly combines luxury and comfort. This place is not only popular among hotel guests, but also among locals and tourists due to its exclusive concept and exciting gaming opportunities.
